column5: My father recently acquired a Minn Kota Endura 36 trolling motor that needs new motor brushes and maybe motor seals. Would anyone happen to know where I could buy parts for it? Somewhere in the GTA would be preferable, but if you have any ideas, please PM me or reply here!  Thanks!
Aikmans in Mississauga is an authorized service center.  A AIKMAN SPORTING GOODS REPAIR  3010 NOVAR RD  MISSISSAUGA,  ON  L5B 1S4  905-277-3595  905-277-0088
Thanks! I'll give them a shout

Did you diagnose these faulty components by using the Minn Kota repair manaul or are you just assuming? The guys at Aikman's really know their stuff, I would be asking them questions to ensure you are replacing the right part.
